name: StubProvider

methods.name: handleMethodCall
methods.signature: public Object handleMethodCall(Object stubbedObject, String stubbedMethodName, System.Type returnType, List<System.Type> listOfParamTypes, List<String> listOfParamNames, List<Object> listOfArgs)
methods.description: Use this method to define the behavior of each method of a stubbed class.

params.name: listOfArgs
params.description: The stubbed object. The name of the invoked method. The return type of the invoked method. A list of the parameter types of the invoked method. A list of the parameter names of the invoked method. The actual argument values passed into this method at runtime.

description: StubProvider is a callback interface that you can use as part of the Apex stub API to implement a mocking framework. Use this interface with the Test.createStub() method to create stubbed Apex objects for testing.
